zh: 我們決定在一個有光、有風、有笑聲的午後，把心意好好放進彼此的名字裡。邀請你一起走進這場溫馨清新的森林儀式。
en: We chose a garden afternoon with breeze and laughter to place our vows inside each other's names. Join us in this gentle forest ceremony.

zh: 2025.10.18 · 15:30 · 森光花園宴會廳｜台北市信義區林蔭路 88 號
en: Oct 18, 2025 · 3:30 PM · Forestlight Conservatory · 88 Linyin Rd, Taipei

zh: radial-gradient(circle at 10% 20%, #ffffff 0, transparent 55%), radial-gradient(circle at 80% 0%, #f0ebdf 0, transparent 50%), linear-gradient(135deg, #fdfaf5, #f3f5ee 60%, #e9efdc)
en: radial-gradient(circle at 10% 20%, #ffffff 0, transparent 55%), radial-gradient(circle at 80% 0%, #f0ebdf 0, transparent 50%), linear-gradient(135deg, #fdfaf5, #f3f5ee 60%, #e9efdc)

zh: 把生活寫成一首溫柔的歌
en: Turning daily life into a gentle song

zh: 我們喜歡慢慢走、慢慢看，紀錄每一個像手繪明信片一樣的日子。期待你們在這裡感受到清新又溫暖的氛圍。
en: We like to walk slowly, sketching each day like a postcard. We hope you feel the same soft, fresh warmth here.

zh: 喜歡手沖咖啡、畫小插畫，陪著予晴後製相片、學習日常的小儀式。
en: Enjoys pour-over coffee, sketching doodles, and editing photos with Yu-Ching while honoring little rituals.

zh: 熱愛植物、旅行，也喜歡和家人一起佈置小角落。她說婚禮是一場把初心好好收藏的過程。
en: Loves plants, travel, and decorating cozy corners with family. She says the wedding is for collecting their first promises.

zh: 第一次雨後散步回家，就決定把彼此寫進未來。婚禮這天，我們準備了滿滿綠意、手寫卡片，以及專為你收藏祝福的角落。
en: After a rain-washed walk we decided to write one another into the future. For the wedding we prepared greenery, handwritten cards, and a corner to keep your blessings.
Forestlight Garden · Come wander with us

zh: 我們選了交通方便、充滿自然氣息的地點，歡迎提前到附近散散步。
en: We chose a convenient venue wrapped in nature—feel free to stroll the neighborhood beforehand.

zh: 台北市信義區林蔭路 88 號
捷運｜搭乘信義線至「松山站」，步行約 6 分鐘。
en: Metro · Xinyi Line to Songshan Station, 6 min walk.

zh: 公車｜88、208、藍 10 於「林蔭路口」下車。
開車｜場地下方設有停車場，可直達宴會廳。
en: Driving · Underground parking leads straight to the hall.

zh: 若你需要接駁或協助，請在問卷中留言，我們會安排小幫手與你聯繫。
en: Need a shuttle or assistance? Leave a note in the RSVP and we'll have a helper contact you.

zh: 你的喜好，我們想好好照顧
en: We want to take good care of you

zh: 此表單之後會串接 Google Sheets，現在先用簡易版本收集需求。
en: We'll later connect this form to Google Sheets; for now it gathers your needs simply.

zh: 表單送出後會跳出感謝訊息，正式串接 Google Sheets 時會再通知。
en: You'll see a thank-you message after sending; we'll update you when Google Sheets integration is live.

zh: 收到你的回覆了，謝謝你！
送出時發生問題，請稍後再試。
en: Something went wrong—please try again soon.

zh: 目前無法連線，請檢查網路後重試。
en: We can't reach the RSVP server right now. Check your connection and try again.

zh: 願這場儀式感，與你共享
en: May this ceremony be shared with you

zh: 用一封溫柔的喜帖，把我們的祝福親手遞給你。
en: A gentle card to hand our blessings to you.

zh: 我們誠摯邀請你，見證這份森林裡的承諾。在滿是綠意的午後，我們會交換誓言、點亮蠟燭，也為每一位遠道而來的朋友準備小禮物。期待和你一起留下最溫暖的合照。
en: We warmly invite you to witness this forest promise. We'll trade vows, light candles, and prepare gifts for every friend who travels to us. Let's capture a heartfelt photo together.

zh: 願你今天也被溫柔包圍
en: May today wrap you in gentleness

zh: 我們在每張桌卡、每盞燈光裡藏了一句話，等著你來發現。期待在林間的微光裡與你乾杯。
en: We hid little phrases in every place card and light, waiting for you to find them. Can't wait to toast with you under the trees.

zh: 可直接部署於 GitHub Pages 的單頁喜帖網站｜感謝你的祝福
en: Single-page invite ready for GitHub Pages · Thank you for your love
